N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2601.2 - Representation

State Regulations
(a) The applicant's
officers, directors and members must be fairly representative of the residents
and other legitimate interests of the neighborhood, and shall have acted in a
responsible manner. (b) A majority
of the company's directors must be residents of the neighborhood. (c) The governing board of directors shall
consist of at least seven persons. Notes
